<div class="treeview">
<onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:use_effects}}: Defines the vibrations and player movement penalties when an item with a continuous use action is being used.
*** {{nbt|boolean|can_sprint}}: If the player can sprint during use. Defaults to {{cd|false}}.
*** {{nbt|float|speed_multiplier}}: A ranged float (0.0-1.0 inclusive) speed multiplier inflicted during use. Defaults to {{cd|0.2}}.
*** {{nbt|bool|interact_vibrations}}: Whether using this item emits the {{cd|minecraft:item_interact_start}} and {{cd|minecraft:item_interact_finish}} [[game event]]s. Defaults to {{cd|true}}.
</onlyinclude>
</div>
